byline.original: By SEWELL CHAN and MELISSA EDDY

abstract: Republicans are conspicuously absent from Paris climate talks; Democrats labor to allay other countries' fears Republican opposition could override any commitment Obama administration makes; some seek to convert climate science skeptics by tabling debate and appealing to economic and health benefits of renewable energy.
lead_paragraph: The party’s unyielding approach in treating the climate talks as a waste of time has even sympathizers shaking their heads.

headline.main: Republicans Make Presence Felt at Climate Talks by Ignoring Them
headline.print_headline: Republicans Make Their Presence Felt at Paris Conference by Ignoring It

snippet: The party’s unyielding approach in treating the climate talks as a waste of time has even sympathizers shaking their heads.

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
keywords.name: subject
